@CrashKoeck I had an office chair for a long time but it wasn't tall enough (it was a cheap one) and I had to use an extra support for my back. I just got am ewin chair and I love it. It still wasn't super cheap but I was able to buy it on sale and use a discount code. Fully adjustable.
